alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 18 at 3:20AM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Eastern Plymouth MA, Western Plymouth MA, Suffolk MA, Southeast Middlesex MA, Northern Bristol MA, Eastern Norfolk MA and Western Norfolk MA Counties. In Rhode Island, Northwest Providence RI, Western Kent RI and Southeast Providence RI Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
